casebody.data:
RONALD LEE DANIEL v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Adele V. Patterson, deputy assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Carolyn K. Longstreth, senior assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided October 2, 2000

VERTEFEUILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
